message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and quality, we believe it's worth $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product, $12,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to offer $9,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with a price of $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns more closely with your budget while still reflecting the value of our product. Looking forward to your feedback.
